title: Rukmini Iyer’s recipe for baked ricotta with new-season asparagus
description:
A one-dish wonder full of the joys of spring, The Roasting Tin author’s vibrant, verdant traybake is ready to shop on Ocado.com

This is a lovely seasonal traybake, starring a whole baked ricotta at the centre. Drizzled with olive oil, sea salt and herbs, the warm ricotta works beautifully with the crisp, lemony roast potatoes, the garlic, peas and asparagus. Instantly shop all these ingredients fresh from ocado.com/wholebakedricotta
